tidbits.title: Panama Canal
tidbits.description: Panama is globally recognized for the Panama Canal, a marvel of engineering connecting the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.

tidbits.title: Biodiversity
tidbits.description: The country boasts rich biodiversity, with rainforests, diverse wildlife, and opportunities for eco-tourism and birdwatching.

tidbits.title: Cultural Fusion
tidbits.description: Panama's culture is a fusion of indigenous, African, and Spanish influences, seen in music, dance, cuisine, and traditional attire.
